content: this is my go to slouch hat pattern it s a simple hat knit in the round that is great for guys or gals always a hit when gifted and worn materials 160 yards of worsted weight yarn 16 circular us 6 & 8 needle us 8 dpns stitch marker darning needle gauge 10 stitches and 12 row = 2 on us 8 in stockinette stitch
